extendedInfo.description: Discuss curling strategy with your teammates or students.  No need to buy a magnetic strategy board, when you can have one right on your phone!!!  Just drag the rocks on the screen to the location you want.  Use the menu button to reset the screen.  Send an image via email, bluetooth, messaging, twitter, facebook, etc...

reviews.title: Straight forward app
reviews.comment: Good but house is squashed (oval) on my nook color running cm7
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like it!!! Works great on my Droid.
reviews.author: A Google User
